description: System-generated unique identifier for this row; used as the primary key.
Identifier of the inventory item (fleet part) this manufacturer record relates to; foreign key to the parts catalog.
Identifier of the producing vendor/brand for the part; foreign key to the manufacturers directory.
Boolean flag indicating the preferred producer for this item when multiple sources exist; likely true/false; confirm with SME.
The vendor’s catalog/part number for this item, as printed on packaging or specifications.
Optional free-text notes about the manufacturer–part association, sourcing, compatibility, or other remarks.
Timestamp when the record was last changed in the system, regardless of actor or process.
Timestamp when a human user most recently updated the record; likely excludes automated updates; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created the record; likely a foreign key to a users or employees table; confirm target.
Timestamp when the record was initially created by a user.
Identifier of the user account that most recently updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was most recently updated by a user.
